title: 2/16 PBE Update

embed.description: The PBE has been updated! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning: PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers! Manage your expectations accordingly. ) ! * *: The PBE is a testing grounds for new, tentative, and sometimes radical changes.

body: TL;DR: With Dominion's retirement, those who have 100 or more wins in the gamemode are being gifted a neat icon. Those servers who were denied access to Dominion will therefore not be allowed to have this icon if they did not have 100+ wins before transferring to their current server EG: OCE. I think this is wholly unfair, and Riot should do something different with how the icon is given out.
